Article.Name: Fishing 1-100 While Questing For Lu Shang's by Diabolos-Brian
Fishing for Fun and Profit by Ctownwoody
Urats Lu Shangs While Skilling Guide

Replacement.Find: \n?\<!--Use '''Crafted Only!''' if item is obtained by synthesis only--\>
\n?\<!--Use {{Crafted Only}} if item is obtained by synthesis only--\>
\n?\<!--same format for Excavation, Mining, Logging, Harvesting, Clamming--\>
\n?\<!-- For Weapons and Armor\. Info is to be displayed exactly as it is in\-game\. --\>
\n?\<!-- For Weapons, Armor, Food, or Medicine, go the following page and copy the text in the "Usage" section of that page\. --\>
\n?\<!-- Number in a stack, or Not Stackable --\>
<!--\ Usage\ is\ \{\{Guild\ Points\ Value\|points\ per\ item\|maximum\ points}}\ If\ nothing\ is\ defined,\ it\ will\ display\ None\.\ See\ Template:Guild\ Points\ Value\ for\ more\ details\.\ -->
<!--\ Usage\ is\ \{\{Resale\ Price\|<min>\|<max>}}\ or\ \{\{Resale\ Price\|None}}\ if\ the\ item\ can't\ be\ sold\.\ See\ Template:Resale\ Price\ for\ more\ details\.\ -->
[' ]*(Used For|Weapon Upgrade)[\:' ]*\[\[Adventuring Fellow Guide#Adventuring Fellow Weapon Upgrades\|Adventuring Fellow Weapon Upgrade\]\]
Replacement.Replace: '''[[Adventuring Fellow]]:''' [[Adventuring Fellow Guide#Adventuring Fellow Weapons|Weapon Upgrade]]

Replacement.Find: ['\[]*Resale Price[\]:' ]*(?:None|Cannot be sold to NPCs?|Cannot be sold)[!\.]?[']*
